abstract: Indian National Congress party calls for resignation of Rajasthan State Chief Minister Vasundhara Raje, widening scandal that has engulfed Prime Min Narendra Modi's governing party.
lead_paragraph: The Indian National Congress party released a witness statement in support of a disgraced cricket magnate that it said had been signed by Vasundhara Raje, the chief minister of Rajasthan State.

headline.main: Calls for a Chief Minister’s Resignation in Indian Scandal
headline.print_headline: Calls for a Chief Minister’s Resignation in Indian Scandal

snippet: The Indian National Congress party released a witness statement in support of a disgraced cricket magnate that it said had been signed by Vasundhara Raje, the chief minister of Rajasthan State.
